author: adammurdoch
msg: * Reverted TypeManager to reference roles by name, rather than type.
* DefaultTypeManager now uses the RoleManager to determine a role's type, to
longer look up a TypeFactory in their service() method.
* Added ROLE field to several interfaces.

author: umagesh
msg: Remove contents from filter reader proposal, now that the code has been migrated to the main tree.

author: umagesh
msg: No more deprecated warnings for aliased attributes of oft-used zip, jar, war and ear tasks.
However, there is *no* guarantee that all these aliases will stay for Ant2.  DestFile is currently the most promising attribute name to be carried over to Ant2.
I have left the @deprecated tags in there and haven't touched javadoc also.

author: umagesh
msg: Check for possible null message and/or null stream.

author: donaldp
msg: Update build file to copy across more of the useful xsl sheets.
